channel.title: Staking With The Web Wallet
channel.description:
Can you stake with the web wallet? If you can only stake with the desktop (QT) wallet. What is the minimum amount of coins needed to stake if any?
Very excited about this coin and choose it over Syscoin. I have a few positions on it and cant wait to get more.

item.title: Staking With The Web Wallet
item.dc:creator: @kflo01 Kenny Graves
item.description:
@kflo01 wrote:

Perfect thank you for the fast reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Staking With The Web Wallet
item.dc:creator: @XxOtakuXx
item.description:
@XxOtakuXx wrote:

Can’t stake with web wallet for now. But will be able to in future.
You can stake with Market client wallet or QT wallet.

Also you’ll need 1m or less coins. But most important thing you need is 4GB ram to stake minimum.

Read full topic
